word_mean: 〔NA〕十二指肠：小肠的第一部分或近侧部，从幽门至空肠，因其长度约十二指宽，故得名

sentence.Network_en: The distal duodenum and jejunum remain on the right side of the spine .
sentence.Network_cn: 远端十二指肠及空肠仍处于脊椎右侧。

sentence.Network_en: This juice - about a quart a day -- pours into my duodenum, neutralizing acids.
sentence.Network_cn: 这种消化液(每天约分泌1品脱)流入我的十二指肠, 把酸中和了.

sentence.Network_en: After the colon, the duodenum is the most common site for diverticulum.
sentence.Network_cn: 继结肠源, 十二指肠是憩室最多见的部位.

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English: from medieval Latin, from duodeni 'in twelves', its length being equivalent to the breadth of approximately twelve fingers

entry.def: Your duodenum is the part of your small intestine that is just below your stomach.

means.word_mean: 1. the part of the small intestine between the stomach and the jejunum
